meanings.definition: The quality of being realistic or resembling real life.
meanings.sent1: The lifelikeness of the painting made it seem almost real.
meanings.sent2: The lifelikeness of the special effects in the movie was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The lifelikeness of the robot's movements was so accurate, it was almost like watching a real person.
meanings.sent4: Her makeup skills were so good that she achieved a lifelikeness that fooled everyone.
meanings.sent5: The lifelikeness of the virtual reality simulation was so convincing that it felt like stepping into another world.

meanings.definition: The state of being true to life or accurately representing reality.
meanings.sent1: The artist captured the lifelikeness of the landscape perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The lifelikeness of the actor's portrayal of the historical figure was remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The lifelikeness of the situation was so uncanny that it felt like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent4: The lifelikeness of her description painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The lifelikeness of the model's pose made it challenging to distinguish from a real person.
